trans-unit.source: Represents a tracking service that uses a SQL database to store tracking information.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用 SQL 数据库来存储跟踪信息的跟踪服务。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The SqlTrackingService class represents a fully functional tracking service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]SqlTrackingService 类表示功能完全的跟踪服务。

trans-unit.source: You can use this service out-of-box to collect and store tracking information, and to store tracking profiles and provide them when requested by the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此服务的现成收集和存储跟踪信息，以及用于存储跟踪配置文件和由工作流运行时引擎请求时提供这些。

trans-unit.source: The SQL tracking service writes tracking data sent to it by the runtime tracking infrastructure to a SQL database.
trans-unit.target: SQL 跟踪服务写入跟踪数据发送给它的运行时跟踪基础结构到 SQL 数据库。

trans-unit.source: In many scenarios it is important for the SqlTrackingService to maintain consistency between its database and the state of the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: 在许多情况下很重要 SqlTrackingService 其数据库和工作流运行时引擎的状态之间保持一致。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the `SqlTrackingChannel` class makes use of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> interface to participate in the workflow transaction batching functionality provided by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，`SqlTrackingChannel`类将使用的<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>接口以参与<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>提供的工作流事务批处理功能</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>

trans-unit.source: You can set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.IsTransactional%2A> or pass the appropriate parameters to the constructor to configure the SqlTrackingService to participate in batching and add objects that represent pending changes to the SQL database to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.IsTransactional%2A>或传递给构造函数配置 SqlTrackingService 要参与批处理，并将表示挂起的更改到<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>的 SQL 数据库的对象添加适当的参数</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.IsTransactional%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SqlTrackingService also maintains tracking profiles in its database.
trans-unit.target: SqlTrackingService 还维护其数据库中的跟踪配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine must be kept apprised of changes to any of the tracking profiles that it is using.
trans-unit.target: 工作流运行时引擎必须得到通知的更改到任何正在使用的跟踪配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The SqlTrackingService implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification> interface and periodically examines the tracking profiles in its database in order to notify the workflow runtime engine of changes to a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> stored in its database.
trans-unit.target: SqlTrackingService 实现<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification>接口，并定期检查其数据库中的跟踪配置文件，以便通知发生更改的工作流运行时引擎<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>存储在其数据库。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification>

trans-unit.source: You can set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileChangeCheckInterval%2A> or pass the appropriate parameter to the constructor in order to set the interval at which the SqlTrackingService examines its tracking profiles to notify the tracking runtime of any profile changes.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileChangeCheckInterval%2A>或将适当的参数传递到构造函数，以便设置从该处 SqlTrackingService 检查其跟踪配置文件，以通知跟踪运行时的任何配置文件更改的间隔。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileChangeCheckInterval%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When using both the SqlTrackingService and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> in a workflow application, it is recommended that you use a single database for both persistence and tracking.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时使用这两个 SqlTrackingService 和<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>在工作流应用程序中，建议为持久性和跟踪使用单个数据库。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref>使用指定的类<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by the workflow runtime engine when the workflow runtime engine is initialized from an application configuration file that specifies a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.
trans-unit.target: 从应用程序配置文件，指定一种<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>在初始化工作流运行时引擎时，工作流运行时引擎将调用此构造函数

trans-unit.source: You can also use this constructor to initialize the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> from a host application.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>从主机应用程序。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> is initialized according to the key-value pairs that are contained in the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>初始化根据<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection>.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection>中包含的键 / 值对</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: The following table enumerates the potential keys, the property which each value initializes, and the type of each property.
trans-unit.target: 下表枚举了可能的键属性，每个值初始化，该属性，每个属性的类型。

trans-unit.source: The value associated with each key should be a string that represents the appropriate type for the property referred to by that key.
trans-unit.target: 与每个键关联的值应为表示由该注册表项的属性的相应类型的字符串。

trans-unit.source: You can specify one or more of these key-value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定一个或多个这些键 / 值对。

trans-unit.source: |Key|Property Type|Property Description| |---------|-------------------|--------------------------| |`"IsTransactional"`|`bool`|Specifies whether <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> participates in workflow transactions by using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.
trans-unit.target: |密钥 |属性类型 |属性说明 | |---------|-------------------|--------------------------| |`"IsTransactional"`|`bool`|指定是否<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>参与工作流事务，通过使用<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: The default is `true`, specifying that tracking changes are written to the database in a synchronous manner.| |`"UseDefaultProfile"`|`bool`|Specifies whether the default tracking profile will be returned if a tracking profile cannot be found for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetProfile%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是`true`，指定跟踪更改写入到数据库以同步方式。 | |`"UseDefaultProfile"`|`bool`|指定是否将返回默认跟踪配置文件，是否跟踪配置文件的找不到为<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetProfile%2A>调用。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetProfile%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default is `true`, specifying that the default tracking profile will be used.| |`"ProfileChangeCheckInterval"`|`double`|Specifies the time in milliseconds at which to examine the database for changes to its tracking profiles.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是`true`，指定将使用默认跟踪配置文件。 | |`"ProfileChangeCheckInterval"`|`double`|以毫秒为单位，用于检查其跟踪配置文件更改的数据库中指定的时间。

trans-unit.source: The default is 60000 milliseconds.| |`"ConnectionString"`|`string`|Specifies the database connection string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 60000 毫秒。 | |`"ConnectionString"`|`string`|指定的数据库连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |`"PartitionOnCompletion"`|`bool`|Specifies whether tracking data for a workflow instance should be moved to the currently active partition in the database when the workflow instance is completed.|
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |`"PartitionOnCompletion"`|`bool`|指定是否工作流实例的跟踪数据应将移到数据库中当前活动的分区工作流实例完成时。 |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> that specifies properties of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref> and their initial values.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref> ，它指定的属性<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref>及其初始值。

trans-unit.source: parameters is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: parameters为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The value associated with a property key in parameters is not represented by either or .
trans-unit.target: 与关联的值中的属性键 parameters 不由其中一种或。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref> class by using the specified database connection string.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref>类通过使用指定的数据库连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: A valid database connection string.
trans-unit.target: 有效的数据库连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The database connection string is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 数据库连接字符串无效。

trans-unit.source: Gets the connection string for the tracking database.
trans-unit.target: 获取跟踪数据库的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The connection string for the tracking database.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪数据库的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a value specifying whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref> will retry when performing a database operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取和设置值，该值指定是否<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref>执行数据库操作时将重试。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.IsTransactional%2A> property is set to `false` and EnableRetries is set to `true`, then all transaction retries depend on the value of the EnableRetries property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.IsTransactional%2A>属性设置为`false`和 EnableRetries 设置为`true`，则所有事务重试都取决 EnableRetries 属性的值。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.IsTransactional%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.IsTransactional%2A> is set to `true`, then certain work is batched and retries of those work batch transactions are handled by a derived type of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>, such as <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.IsTransactional%2A>设置为`true`，然后批处理方式进行某些工作，并由派生类型的处理的这些工作批处理事务的重试<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>，如<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>或<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.IsTransactional%2A>

trans-unit.source: Regardless of whether <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.IsTransactional%2A> is set to `true`, the following work items cannot be batched and any transaction retries must be handled through the EnableRetries property.
trans-unit.target: 而不管是否<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.IsTransactional%2A>设置为`true`、 无法批处理以下工作项和必须通过 EnableRetries 属性处理任何事务重试。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.IsTransactional%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Polling for tracking profile changes.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪配置文件更改轮询。

trans-unit.source: - All writes to a SQL Server database when <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.IsTransactional%2A> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: -所有写入到的 SQL Server 都数据库时<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.IsTransactional%2A>设置为`false`。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.IsTransactional%2A>

trans-unit.source: Besides being set programmatically, this functionality can be enabled through a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 除了以编程方式设置，可以通过配置文件启用此功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to set this property through a configuration file, see [Workflow Configuration Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何通过配置文件设置此属性的详细信息，请参阅[工作流配置文件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909)。

trans-unit.source: For general information about retrying work batch transactions, see [Batching State Information in Workflows](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).
trans-unit.target: 有关重试工作批次事务的常规信息，请参阅[批处理中工作流的状态信息](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref> should retry the operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref>应重试该操作; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref> participates in workflow transactions.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref>参与工作流事务。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily tracking data is written to the database synchronously, that is, the data is written as soon as it is received on the Tracking Channel.
trans-unit.target: 通常，跟踪数据写入数据库同步，也就是说，一旦在跟踪通道上收到写入数据。

trans-unit.source: If IsTransactional is `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> participates in the workflow transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IsTransactional `true`，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>参与工作流事务。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: That is, it follows the semantics defined by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> and adds any changes to its database as work items to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，它遵循定义<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>并添加对为工作项到<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>其数据库的任何更改</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>的语义

trans-unit.source: The service commits these changes when instructed to by the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: 服务将提交这些更改由工作流运行时引擎指示时。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref> participates in the workflow transaction; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref>参与工作流事务中; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether tracking data for a workflow instance should be moved to the currently active partition in the database when the workflow instance is completed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定是否工作流实例的跟踪数据应将移到数据库中当前活动的分区工作流实例完成时。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> allows you to partition the database in order to provide an efficient method for archiving and deleting tracking records.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>，可将数据库分区，以便提供存档和删除跟踪记录的一种有效方法。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: If your database experiences long periods between down times or your database has no planned downtime, you can set PartitionOnCompletion to move tracking records associated with a workflow instance from the active instance tables to the currently active partition when the workflow instance completes.
trans-unit.target: 工作流实例完成时，如果你的数据库遇到之间停机时间很长一段或你的数据库有没有计划的停机时间，可以设置 PartitionOnCompletion 将跟踪记录与工作流实例从活动实例表到当前活动的分区。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to archive or delete these records without having to lock the data in the active instance tables of the database.
trans-unit.target: 这样可存档或删除这些记录，而无需锁定数据库的活动实例表中的数据。

trans-unit.source: For more information about partitioning, see [Data Maintenance with SqlTrackingService](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/a62d5719-d6cd-4871-a3ab-56ea629d4e00).
trans-unit.target: 有关分区的详细信息，请参阅[SqlTrackingService 与数据维护](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/a62d5719-d6cd-4871-a3ab-56ea629d4e00)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if tracking data should be moved to the currently active partition on workflow completion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果跟踪数据应移动到在工作流完成; 当前活动的分区否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the interval at which the database should be checked for changes to one or more of its tracking profiles.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定应从该处检查数据库更改到一个或多个其跟踪配置文件的间隔。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> periodically examines the database to determine whether one or more of its tracking profiles have been changed or have been deleted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>定期检查数据库以确定是否一个或多个其跟踪配置文件已更改或已被删除。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> determines that a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> has been deleted it raises an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileRemoved> event; when it determines that a profile has been changed it raises a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated> event.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>确定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>已被删除它引发<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileRemoved>事件; 它在确定配置文件已更改它引发<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated>事件。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileRemoved> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure subscribes to both of these events and updates its tracking profile cache appropriately when they occur.
trans-unit.target: 运行时跟踪基础结构订阅这两个这些事件和更新其跟踪配置文件缓存相应地发生时。

trans-unit.source: You can also subscribe to either or both of these events if you want to be notified of changes to a tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要对跟踪配置文件的更改通知，还可以订阅到一种或两个事件。

trans-unit.source: You can set ProfileChangeCheckInterval to specify the frequency with which the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> should test for such changes.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置与指定的频率的 ProfileChangeCheckInterval<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>应进行测试以这种更改。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: When you specify a new value for ProfileChangeCheckInterval, the timer interval is immediately set to this new value.
trans-unit.target: 当为 ProfileChangeCheckInterval 指定新值时，计时器间隔立即设置为此新值。

trans-unit.source: The interval length in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 以毫秒为单位的间隔长度。

trans-unit.source: The default is 60000.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 60000。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref> detects that a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref>检测到<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>已被删除。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> periodically examines its database to determine whether one or more of its tracking profiles have been deleted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>定期检查其数据库，以确定是否已删除一个或多个其跟踪配置文件。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: If it detects that a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> has been deleted, it raises the ProfileRemoved event and puts the workflow <xref:System.Type> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 如果检测到<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>已被删除，它引发 ProfileRemoved 事件，并将工作流<xref:System.Type>中<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs>。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure uses this event to update its profile cache.
trans-unit.target: 运行时跟踪基础结构使用此事件来更新其配置文件缓存。

trans-unit.source: You can set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileChangeCheckInterval%2A> to specify the frequency at which the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> examines its database.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileChangeCheckInterval%2A>指定的频率<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>检查其数据库。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileChangeCheckInterval%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref> detects that a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> has been changed.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref>检测到<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>已更改。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> periodically examines its database to determine whether one or more of its tracking profiles have been changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>定期检查其数据库，以确定是否已更改一个或多个其跟踪配置文件。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: If it detects such a change in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>, it raises the ProfileUpdated event with the tracking profile encapsulated in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 如果它检测到此类更改<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>，它会引发具有封装在一种<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>跟踪配置文件的 ProfileUpdated 事件</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure uses this event to update its profile cache.
trans-unit.target: 运行时跟踪基础结构使用此事件来更新其配置文件缓存。

trans-unit.source: You can set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileChangeCheckInterval%2A> to specify the frequency at which the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> examines its database.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileChangeCheckInterval%2A>指定的频率<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>检查其数据库。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileChangeCheckInterval%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying whether a default <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> should be used for workflow types that do not have a tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置值，该值指定是否默认<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>应为没有跟踪配置文件的工作流类型使用。

trans-unit.source: If UseDefaultProfile is `true`, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> will return a default <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> whenever the workflow runtime engine tries to get a tracking profile for a workflow <xref:System.Type> for which the tracking service has no associated <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: 如果 UseDefaultProfile `true`，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>将返回默认<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>每当工作流运行时引擎尝试获取<xref:System.Type>对其跟踪服务具有任何关联的<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile></xref:System.Type>工作流的跟踪配置文件</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: The out-of-box default tracking profile matches all activity events, user events, and workflow events emitted by a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 现成的默认跟踪配置文件匹配所有活动事件、 用户事件和工作流实例发出的工作流事件。

trans-unit.source: You can change the default tracking profile by using the `UpdateDefaultProfile` stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 你可以更改默认跟踪配置文件使用`UpdateDefaultProfile`存储过程。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `UpdateDefaultProfile` stored procedure will change the default tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;>`UpdateDefaultProfile`存储的过程将更改默认跟踪配置文件。

trans-unit.source: This new default profile will be returned when the workflow runtime engine requests a profile for a workflow type for which the tracking service has no associated tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: 当工作流运行时引擎请求的跟踪服务对其具有没有关联的跟踪配置文件工作流类型的配置文件时，将返回此新的默认配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Workflow types that were previously associated with the old default profile will still be associated with that profile even after `UpdateDefaultProfile` is called; you must explicitly call the `UpdateTrackingProfile` stored procedure on any of these workflow types that you want to associate with the new default profile.
trans-unit.target: 以前与旧默认配置文件相关联的工作流类型仍将与该配置文件相关联后仍`UpdateDefaultProfile`调用; 你必须明确地调用`UpdateTrackingProfile`上的所有这些工作流类型，你想要将与新的默认配置文件相关联的存储过程。

trans-unit.source: While UseDefaultProfile is true, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> will return the default tracking profile to the workflow runtime engine for any workflow type for which it doesn't have a tracking profile associated in its database.
trans-unit.target: 为 true，UseDefaultProfile 时<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>将返回到为其它没有跟踪配置文件在其数据库中相关联的任何工作流类型的工作流运行时引擎跟踪配置文件的默认。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: If you later set UseDefaultProfile to false, the default profile will still be associated with these workflow types in the database.
trans-unit.target: 如果你更高版本设置为 false 的 UseDefaultProfile，默认配置文件仍将与数据库中这些工作流类型关联。

trans-unit.source: You can call the `DeleteTrackingProfile` stored procedure on a workflow type to no longer associate a tracking profile with that type, or you can call the `UpdateTrackingProfile` stored procedure on a workflow type to change the tracking profile associated with that type.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用`DeleteTrackingProfile`上不再将跟踪配置文件与该类型，或你相关联的工作流类型的存储的过程可以调用`UpdateTrackingProfile`的工作流类型，可以更改该类型关联的跟踪配置文件的存储过程。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The workflow runtime engine caches its tracking profiles.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 工作流运行时引擎将缓存其跟踪配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it must receive a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileRemoved> event for any workflow type for which it already has a tracking profile associated in its cache before it will stop using its cached profile for new instances of that workflow type.
trans-unit.target: 因此，数据库必须先接收<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileRemoved>为它已经具有跟踪配置文件之前它将停止为该工作流类型的新实例使用其缓存的配置文件关联在其缓存中的任何工作流类型的事件。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileRemoved>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, the workflow runtime engine must receive a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated> event for such workflow types before it will load a new tracking profile into its cache to associate with new instances of the workflow type.
trans-unit.target: 同样，工作流运行时引擎必须接收<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated>之前它将新的跟踪配置文件加载到关联的工作流类型的新实例，并用其缓存此类工作流类型的事件。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> raises the appropriate events for applicable workflow types when it examines the database for changes to its tracking profiles.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>引发适用的工作流类型的相应事件时它会检查其跟踪配置文件更改的数据库。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: The frequency at which the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> performs this operation is set by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileChangeCheckInterval%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 频率<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>执行此操作将由<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileChangeCheckInterval%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileChangeCheckInterval%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, whenever you call the `UpdateTrackingProfile` or `DeleteTrackingProfile` stored procedures there may be a delay of up to the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileChangeCheckInterval%2A> before the workflow runtime engine will reflect your changes in its profile cache.
trans-unit.target: 因此，每当调用`UpdateTrackingProfile`或`DeleteTrackingProfile`存储的过程可能最多指定的时期的延迟<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileChangeCheckInterval%2A>之前工作流运行时引擎将反映其配置文件缓存中所做的更改。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileChangeCheckInterval%2A>

trans-unit.source: > > For more information about tracking profiles, see [Creating and Using Tracking Profiles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f018ad09-d20f-4626-9792-31d9f278d0b0).
trans-unit.target: >> 有关跟踪配置文件的详细信息，请参阅[创建和使用跟踪配置文件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f018ad09-d20f-4626-9792-31d9f278d0b0)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a default tracking profile should be used; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应使用默认跟踪配置文件;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
